verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was led <S%G321><s%> up by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> by the devil. <S%G1228><s%>
And after He had fasted <S%G3522><s%> forty <S%G5065><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and forty <S%G5065><s%> nights, <S%G3571><s%> He then <S%G5306><s%> became hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And the tempter <S%G3985><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1487><s%> You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> command <S%G3004><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "It is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'Man <S%G444><s%> shall not live <S%G2198><s%> on bread <S%G740><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> but on every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> Him into the holy <S%G40><s%> city; <S%G4172><s%> and he had Him stand <S%G2476><s%> on the pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple, <S%G2413><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1487><s%> You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> throw <S%G906><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> down; <S%G2736><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'He will give <S%G1781><s%> His angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> You'; and 'On [their] hands <S%G5495><s%> they will bear <S%G142><s%> You up, Lest <S%G3379><s%> You strike <S%G4350><s%> Your foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>'"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, "On the other <S%G3825><s%> hand, <S%G3825><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'You shall not put <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> to the test. <S%G1598><s%>'"

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> Him to a very <S%G3029><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and showed <S%G1166><s%> Him all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and their glory; <S%G1391><s%>

and he said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> You, if <S%G1437><s%> You fall <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> me."

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Begone, <S%G5217><s%> Satan! <S%G4567><s%> For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'You shall worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God, <S%G2316><s%> and serve <S%G3000><s%> Him only. <S%G3441><s%>'"
Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> left <S%G863><s%> Him; and behold, <S%G2400><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and [began] to minister <S%G1247><s%> to Him.
Now <S%G1161><s%> when He heard <S%G191><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> had been taken <S%G3860><s%> into custody, <S%G3860><s%> He withdrew <S%G402><s%> into Galilee; <S%G1056><s%>

and leaving <S%G2641><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> and settled <S%G2730><s%> in Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> which is by the sea, <S%G3864><s%> in the region <S%G3725><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and Naphtali. <S%G3508><s%>
[This was] to fulfill <S%G4137><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"The land <S%G1093><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and the land <S%G1093><s%> of Naphtali, <S%G3508><s%> By the way <S%G3598><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> â€“

"The people <S%G2992><s%> who were sitting <S%G2521><s%> in darkness <S%G4653><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> And to those <S%G3588><s%> who were sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the land <S%G5561><s%> and shadow <S%G4639><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> Upon them a light <S%G5457><s%> dawned. <S%G393><s%>"

From that time <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> and say, <S%G3004><s%> "Repent, <S%G3340><s%> for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand. <S%G1448><s%>"

And walking <S%G4043><s%> by the Sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> who was called <S%G3004><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and Andrew <S%G406><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into the sea; <S%G2281><s%> for they were fishermen. <S%G231><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G3694><s%> Me, and I will make <S%G4160><s%> you fishers <S%G231><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>"
And they immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the nets, <S%G1350><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And going <S%G4260><s%> on from there <S%G1564><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the [son] of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> with Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> their father, <S%G3962><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> their nets; <S%G1350><s%> and He called <S%G2564><s%> them.
And they immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> and their father, <S%G3962><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And [Jesus] was going <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G3956><s%> of disease <S%G3554><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G3956><s%> of sickness <S%G3119><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

And the news <S%G189><s%> about Him went <S%G565><s%> out into all <S%G3650><s%> Syria; <S%G4947><s%> and they brought <S%G4374><s%> to Him all <S%G3956><s%> who were ill, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> taken <S%G4912><s%> with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> and pains, <S%G931><s%> demoniacs, <S%G1139><s%> epileptics, <S%G4583><s%> paralytics; <S%G3885><s%> and He healed <S%G2323><s%> them.

And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Him from Galilee <S%G1056><s%> and Decapolis <S%G1179><s%> and Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> and Judea <S%G2453><s%> and [from] beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>
